title: Fort Larned National Historic Site: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations      Reservations Ranger-guided tours of Fort Larned are offered year-round by reservation.  Large groups, such as tour groups or school groups, must reserve guided tours in advance.  Call 620-285-6911 for reservations. As staffing allows, scheduled guided tours may be offered throughout the day.  Call 620-285-6911 to find out about the park's current tour schedule.
